mapper.select: SELECT v.voc_id , v.impute_id , v.voc_content , i.impute_type , v.reg_date , c.code_nm AS vocIssue , v.voc_state , CASE WHEN v.comp_request_yn = 'Y' THEN '배상요청' WHEN v.comp_request_yn = 'N' THEN '배상미요청' END AS compRequestYn , CASE WHEN i.impute_type = '0ImpD' THEN '운송사귀책' WHEN i.impute_type = '0ImpC' THEN '고객사귀책' END AS imputeNm FROM voc v LEFT JOIN code c ON v.voc_state = c.code_id LEFT JOIN impute i ON v.impute_id = i.impute_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voc( voc_content , comp_request_yn , reg_date , impute_id , voc_state ) VALUES( #{vocContent} , #{compRequestYn} , NOW() , (SELECT MAX(impute_id) FROM impute) , '1VocW' )
mapper.update: UPDATE voc SET voc_state = #{compensationState} , reg_date = NOW() WHERE voc_id = (SELECT voc_id FROM (SELECT c.voc_id FROM compensation c LEFT JOIN timfdb.voc v ON c.voc_id = v.voc_id WHERE c.compensation_id = #{compensationId})as t)
